scripts.migrate: sqd typegen && sqd codegen && sqd migration:generate && sqd migration:apply
scripts.deploy:staging: ENVIRONMENT=staging pnpm setenv && pnpm run deploy
scripts.deploy:prod: ENVIRONMENT=production pnpm setenv && pnpm run deploy
scripts.sqd:local:prod: sqd down && ENVIRONMENT=production sqd up && ENVIRONMENT=production sqd process
scripts.sqd:local:staging: sqd down && ENVIRONMENT=staging sqd up && ENVIRONMENT=staging sqd process
